Name: Liz ~The Tower and the Grimoire~
About the game: Liz and her mentor Aisha, are talented witches. But despite their talent, a thief manages to steal a powerful tome called the “Grimoire of Darkness” from them. Chasing after the man, they end up near the town of Bramach. Aisha senses danger emanating from the area and orders Liz to stay behind. However, unwilling to heed her mentor’s words, Liz heads into the town to continue her pursuit of the thief. Features: Classic RPG Experience Explore an immersive fantasy world Turn-based Combat Crafting
